package.name: Yellow_Pay
package.summary: Accept payments in Bitcoin and have them automatically converted to your local currency
package.description:
Yellow is a bitcoin payment processor that enables merchants to accept bitcoin payments without any risk. Our product is an API based solution that is easy to integrate with all major e-commerce platforms, such as Magento, Wordpress and Drupal.
With Yellow, online merchants can start accepting bitcoin payments with low-to-no merchant fees and receive timely settlements in their local currency.
The below 6 steps explain how Bitcoin payments are processed by Yellow:
1. The customer completes their shopping cart on the merchant’s site and proceeds to check out
2. Yellow generates a unique, one-time-use Bitcoin address to accept payment which is then displayed on the merchant’s site.
3. The address is displayed both in text and QR-code form.
4. The customer sends payment (in Bitcoin) to the Bitcoin address, using either their smartphone Bitcoin wallet to scan the QR-code, or a web or desktop based Bitcoin wallet (e.g., blockchain.info, Bitcoin-QT)
5. Bitcoin payment is received and the customer is redirected to an order confirmation page on the merchant’s site
6. Yellow converts the received Bitcoin payment into a national currency (like AED) and transfers it to the merchant’s bank account
